artist: Artist: Nate Powell; Author: Kent McClard; Publisher: Ebullition Records, Goleta, Calif.
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress text and photomechanical illustration of a figure sitting in the forest with a rifle printed in offset lithography on wove paper covers; 6 pp.
title: Ebullition, no. 41
